biography.placeOfBirth: Buitenzorg, Buitenzorg, Dutch East Indies [now Bogor, West Java, Indonesia]
biography.bio: Suzzanna was born on October 14, 1942 in Buitenzorg, Buitenzorg, Dutch East Indies as Suzanna Martha Frederika van Osch. She was an actress, known for La reine de la magie noire (1983), Nyi blorong (1982) and Samson and Delilah (1987). She was married to Clift Sangra and Dicky Suprapto. She died on October 15, 2008 in Magelang, Central Java, Indonesia.
biography.name: Suzzanna

biography.bio: Jafar Breel is an actor, known for Jaka Sembung & Bergola Ijo (1985) and Sundelbolong (1982).
biography.name: Jafar Breel

biography.placeOfBirth: Teloekbetoeng, Lampongsche Districten, Dutch East Indies [now Bandar Lampung, Lampung, Indonesia]
biography.bio: H.I.M. Damsyik was born on March 14, 1929 in Teloekbetoeng, Lampongsche Districten, Dutch East Indies as Haji Incik Muhammad Damsyik. He was an actor, known for Kembalinya si janda kembang (1992), Samson and Delilah (1987) and Satan's Slave (1982). He died on February 2, 2012 in South Jakarta, Indonesia.
biography.name: H.I.M. Damsyik

biography.bio: Eddy Hansudi is known for his work on Without Mercy (1995), Angel of Fury (1992) and Intruder (1986).
biography.name: Eddy Hansudi

biography.bio: Marlia Hardi is an actress, known for The Narrow Bridge (1982), Sundelbolong (1982) and Puspa indah taman hati (1979).
biography.name: Marlia Hardi

biography.bio: Rukman Herman is an actor, known for Savage Terror (1980), The Warrior (1981) and Samson and Delilah (1987).
biography.name: Rukman Herman

biography.bio: Jack John is an actor, known for Manusia enam juta dollar (1981), Sundelbolong (1982) and Aladin dan lampu wasiat (1982).
biography.name: Jack John

biography.bio: Eddy Bakar Pare is an actor, known for Rambut keriting (1983), Sundelbolong (1982) and Kesan pertama (1985).
biography.name: Eddy Bakar Pare

biography.bio: Ruth Pelupessi is an actress, known for Satan's Slave (1982), Ferocious Female Freedom Fighters (1982) and Perkawinan nyi blorong (1983).
biography.name: Ruth Pelupessi

biography.bio: Barry Prima (real name Bertus Knoch) was born in Bandung, West Java, Indonesia. His father was a Dutch physician, his mother Indonesian. They had four children (three boys, one girl), with Bertus being the oldest. His sister graduated from Pajajaran University in Bandung with a medical degree and is a doctor, but Bertus only got his high school degree from Aloysius High School in Bandung. He learned taekwando in a small martial-arts studio located behind his father's house on Jalan Dago (Dago street). The taekwando master at that time was known as Master Kang, from Malaysia. In his early 20s, Bertus came to the attention of Indonesian producer Gope T. Samtani, who offered him a small role in a picture he was making about cannibals. Bertus took it, the picture--Savage Terror (1980)--became a hit and Samtani changed Bertus' name to Barry Prima. In his second film he played opposite renowned Indonesian star Suzzanna, as her husband who gets killed in the middle of the movie. Prima soon became the biggest star in Indonesian films, making a string of action/fantasy films for various studios. He made several pictures with Eva Arnaz and was briefly married to her. Famously reclusive, and somewhat ornery, he seldom gives interviews and in the few he has given often contradicts himself (many interviewers suspect he does it deliberately); he once said that he never wanted to be an actor and never made a good movie because the scripts were always so bad and the budgets were always so low, but later in the same interview he said that he enjoyed making films and liked everyone he worked with. After several years off the screen, he played a cameo (in drag!) in Upi Avianto's "Realita Cinta dan Rock 'n Roll" (2006).
biography.name: Barry Prima

biography.bio: Rudy Salam is an actor, known for 2014 (2014), Langkah-langkah pasti (1989) and Mursala (2013).
biography.name: Rudy Salam

biography.bio: Diana Suarkom is an actress, known for Satan's Slave (1982), Ferocious Female Freedom Fighters (1982) and Samson and Delilah (1987).
biography.name: Diana Suarkom
